content:
When I restart the server, the following error will be reported？What is this password? The computer power-on password does not work.

su zulip -c '/home/zulip/deployments/current/scripts/restart-server'
Password:
su: Authentication failure
@longgong Are you running that command as root? If so, su shouldn't be asking for a password :thinking:
@Mateusz Mandera thank you，I have solved the problem.
